Trial_Design.evidence: Fifty patients who complained of postoperative headache after MVD were randomized

Participants.evidence: Fifty patients who complained of postoperative headache after MVD

Intervention.evidence: randomized to receive an s.c. injection of sumatriptan (6 mg) or saline

Objective.evidence: investigated whether postoperative administration of sumatriptan after MVD surgery impacts the quality of postoperative recovery

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was quality of recovery as measured by the Quality of Recovery-40 (QoR-40) score at 24 h.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Fifty patients who complained of postoperative headache after MVD were randomized

Result_Outcome.evidence: The QoR-40 scores were significantly higher in the sumatriptan group (median 184; interquartile range 169–196) than in the placebo group (133; 119–155; P <0.01)
